original_title: Face to Face Kalashnikov vs M 16
overview: A duel to the death… A combat between two inventions. Two deadly weapons. This time, our « duellists » are not men, but objects which largely surpass the fame and notoriety of their inventors. They come face to face not in offices and markets, but in battlefields. The two mythical weapons have been facing off for some 60 years
title: Face to Face Kalashnikov vs M 16
